page.title: 17PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: . Collingbourne Ducis Parish Council has 11 members. The chairman is Mr.B.Sample and he has held the office for the last seven years.The clerk is Mrs.A.Hutchings. The council meets erery month with the exception of August and the meetings are now held in the village hall.There are three committees of the council and they look after finance, planning and property. These committees meet occasionally, though the planning group has the most to do as there are lots of applications to build. The parish council has provided play equipment in three places in the village; they have planted trees around the recreation ground and they have providedstreet lights in several places.
